primary.description: Deep Forest Green - Used for primary branding, sidebar active states, and strong headers.

secondary.description: Pale Mint - Used for backgrounds of active items, subtle highlights.

accent.description: Vibrant Emerald - Used for success states, positive data trends, and call-to-action highlights.

background.description: Off-white/Cool Gray 50 for main app background. Pure white for cards.

left_panel.content: High-quality architectural/solar image with dark overlay.
left_panel.elements: Logo (Top Left), Testimonial or Mission Statement (Bottom Left).

dashboard.structure: Sidebar Navigation + Top Header + Main Content Area

sidebar.style: bg-white border-r border-border w-64 fixed h-full z-30 hidden lg:block
sidebar.item_style: flex items-center gap-3 px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-secondary hover:text-primary transition-colors

header.style: h-16 border-b border-border bg-white/80 backdrop-blur sticky top-0 z-20 flex items-center justify-between px-6

main_content.style: pt-20 pb-12 px-6 lg:pl-72 bg-background min-h-screen

buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-input hover:bg-secondary hover:text-primary-foreground

cards.default: bg-white border border-border/60 shadow-sm rounded-xl overflow-hidden

inputs.default: h-10 rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.

universal_guidelines: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings to establish the tech-forward brand.
Use 'Public Sans' for body text to ensure high readability in data-dense views.
All interactive elements must have a hover state.
Ensure all forms have client-side validation with clear error messages.
Dashboard widgets should use a consistent height where possible.
Use 'recharts' for data visualization with the custom color palette defined above.

setup: Install fonts: Outfit and Public Sans via Google Fonts or Fontsource.
Update tailwind.config.js with the custom colors and font families.
Create a 'Layout' component for the Dashboard structure.
Create an 'AuthLayout' component for the Login/Register pages.
